Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. I believe it could significantly enhance your daily routine or achieve specific goals you're working towards. Considering its unique features and benefits, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $75. This offer is tailored to ensure you have the chance to experience the product's full potential without any financial hesitation. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this special offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
